/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their green leaves contrasting with the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The street itself is devoid of any traffic or pedestrians, adding a sense of tranquility to the image.
